rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer to welcome the family and guests.
Open living area with floor-to-ceiling windows facing west for natural light; integrates Bohemian design elements.
Modern dining space adjacent to the living room.
Cozy library with bookshelves and seating area, featuring built-in lighting that complements Bohemian aesthetics.
A comfortable guest bedroom with personal space for visitors.
Primary suite with ensuite bathroom and storage, designed for privacy.
Multi-purpose space for family activities or as an additional study area.

swimming_pool.location: Outdoor Terrace adjacent to the Family Room
swimming_pool.description: A small but luxurious swimming pool that complements the Bohemian design and provides relaxation.

vastu_considerations.note: Ensure that main entrances face east for positive energy flow; adjust window placements accordingly.

vastu_considerations.color_palette: Earthy tones with pops of vibrant colors
vastu_considerations.note: Supports the Bohemian aesthetic while maintaining Vastu harmony.
